data.name: The Paribneur Combination
data.detailed_description:
The Paribneur Combination is a thriller/horror game set in the 90's, where the detective Darren Wolfe is sent to investigate the old building of a company that shut down years ago. You are suddenly trapped inside, and must find a new exit.

Explore

Explore the abandoned facilities of Paribneur Industries, and collect items that will aid you along the way, as you are forced to find a new way out.

Unveil Secrets

Listen to voice logs and read old papers, and discover the past. Unveil the true intentions of the company. Discover the dark secrets that Paribneur Industries was keeping, and find your way out.

Solve The Combination

Solve The Paribneur Combination, and escape the facility.

Tread Carefully

Otherwordly entities roam the halls...
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Make your way through the abandoned establishment of Paribneur Co. As you discover the hidden secrets and horrifying creatures of the building. Being forced to find a new way out of the building, you will face hard choices, choose carefully, your choices will affect the rest of the game...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MSI GTX-960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might run on older windows versions.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX-2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might run on older windows versions.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains fear and horror elements, blood, mentions of murder, and death of the player in various ways.
